alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Coffee; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 2:24PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Coffee, Atkinson and northwestern Ware Counties through 315 PM EST... At 224 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 7 miles northeast of Cogdell, or 11 miles east of Pearson, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pearson, Millwood and Axson. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for southeastern Georgia.
